rooms.name: The Worst Room In The Game

to.note: This link is basically divided up between what it takes to kill the SpacePirates and what it takes to reach the node. It doesn't seem possible to break the bomb blocks from below with Screw unless you have Space Jump
Without HiJump or any suit it can be done with Crystal Flash but will keep that out for now.
Most RNG patterns allow for 0 or 1 hits without weapon but some require 2 and a bit of extra time.
The KiHunters are much easier to avoid coming in from above, no need to kill them
Requires only Morph because access to the node is impossible without breaking the bomb blocks.
